price.title: Access to an experimentation lab
price.slogan: Build a portfolio. Test ideas. Document learning.
price.monthly_info: monthly access to the experimental environment
price.contact: to discuss collaboration, research, or case studies.
price.contact_2: MindLoop does not offer ready-made solutions or decision automation.
price.faq_detail: Understand the experimental, educational, and exploratory nature of MindLoop.

hero.tagline_sub: A place to experiment with thinking systems
hero.title: Delegating decisions to AI is risky
hero.description: MindLoop is an experimental space to explore how humans and AI systems can think together about complex problems.

manifesto.title: Ideas before products. Reasoning before automation.
manifesto.description: Each MindLoop project is a documented experiment. The goal is not to deliver answers, but to investigate how decisions can be better structured.

cta_final.title: A portfolio built on real ideas.
cta_final.description: Here you access ideas in progress: projects, texts, articles, reflections, and prototypes I develop over time. MindLoop works as a living extension of my thinking.

trusted_by.tagline: Explored by curious professionals and applied researchers

iaa_concept.title: AI as an object of study
iaa_concept.description: Assisted Artificial Intelligence is a concept created to guide the conscious use of AI. At MindLoop, AI is not given responsibility nor does it make decisions. It acts as an amplifier of human thinking and as a means of accessing the knowledge accumulated by humanity.
iaa_concept.human_desc: Responsible for meaning and decision-making. Formulates hypotheses, interprets results, evaluates consequences, and fully assumes responsibility for choices made.
iaa_concept.ai_desc: Acts as cognitive support. Organizes information, retrieves knowledge, suggests reasoning paths, and makes relationships explicit to support human thinking.
iaa_concept.loop_desc: A space of continuous learning between human and AI. The value lies in iteration, reflection, and refinement of reasoning — not in the final answer.

superpowers.title: What makes
superpowers.description: An environment to responsibly test complex ideas.
superpowers.item_1_desc: Each experiment is a documented artifact of learning.
superpowers.item_2_desc: We investigate how context shapes AI-assisted decisions.
superpowers.item_3_desc: Humans remain at the center of all decisions.
superpowers.item_4_desc: No promises of automation or human replacement.

about.title: About the
about.description_1: MindLoop is an independent laboratory for experimentation in applied AI.
about.description_2: Here, projects exist to generate learning — not commercial products.

story.title: Why a lab?
story.description_1: Because real decisions require reflection before automation.
story.description_2: MindLoop documents paths of thought, not final answers.

culture.title: Our
culture.description: Thinking before building, always grounded in real problems.
culture.item_1_desc: Each project starts from a concrete problem and is treated as a practical experiment.
culture.item_2_desc: AI is not an authority or a ready-made solution — it is a tool to support human decisions.
culture.item_3_desc: The value lies in documented processes that are tested and applicable to real contexts.

timeline.title: Lab Evolution
timeline.text_2025: Formalization of the lab and the IAA™ philosophy.

product_flow.title: How experiments take place
product_flow.description: Each flow is a case study.
product_flow.step_2_text: AI organizes rules, data, and possibilities.

testimonials.title: Lab insights
testimonials.quote_1: Here, the value is in reasoning, not in the answer.
testimonials.quote_2: It's a great space to build a real AI portfolio.

loopynlats.title: LoopynLATS
loopynlats.subtitle: Decision trees that know when they are uncertain
loopynlats.description: LoopynLATS is a probabilistic decision tree engine built for real-world systems — where decisions are rarely black or white.
loopynlats.features: It measures uncertainty explicitly, escalates ambiguity to humans, and records every decision for full auditability.
loopynlats.core_description: If a system is uncertain, it should say so — and ask for help.
loopynlats.conclusion: LoopynLATS turns uncertainty into a first-class control signal using probability, entropy, and Human-in-the-Loop governance.

marketing.title: A lab to think with AI.
marketing.sub_title: Exploration, applied research, and portfolio building.

people_comment.title: Shared learning
people_comment.desc: Stories from those building portfolios with MindLoop.
